alert.note: Alert for Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 05 at 11:05PM AKST until January 06 at 9:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway. * WHEN...Until 9 AM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Wind chills will be as low as 30 to 40 below zero. Blowing snow will reduce visibility.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
